alert.note: Alert for Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued February 05 at 3:09AM AKST until February 07 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST MONDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. The dangerously cold wind chills will cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to exposed skin. Expect wind chills to range from 50 below zero to 65 below zero. * WHERE...Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...Now to noon Monday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind chill values in the 45 to 55 below range today will worsen this evening as winds increase and temperatures decrease. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Wind Chill Warning means the combination of very cold air and sustained wind speeds of 15 mph or more will create dangerously low wind chill values. Frost bite can occur quickly and even hypothermia or death if precautions are not taken.
